item.title: Working Calculator
item.description: Hello friends, today in this blog you will learn how to make a working calculator with using HTML and CSS only. Now, let’s start the tutorial.Firstly, we need to create two empty file for the html and css. Copy and paste the following code <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge"> <title>calculator</title> <link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css" type="text/css" media="all" /> </head> <body> <div class="wrapper"> <form action="" name="forms"> <input type="text" name="answer" class="output"/> <div class="btn-container"> <div class="btns"> <input type="button" value="AC" onclick="forms.

item.title: Coding By Phone
item.description: Hello my friends, today in this tutorial, we will learn how to code your own website using your mobile phone. Notice Before staring this tutorial, you need to have a basic in the HTML and CSS for coding. And also, this tutorial only for the people who is very interested in website development but no computer. If you have a computer, I am not recommend you to coding using mobile because it is very tired :(

item.title: QR Code Generator
item.description: Hello readers, today in this blog you will learn how to create a qr code generator yourself using the html,css (optional) and javascript. Now, let’s start the tutorial.First,you need to create a html file and this is the html code needed. <form onsubmit="generate();return false;"> <div class="input"> <input type="text" id="qr" name="" placeholder="Enter a values"> </div> </form> <div id="qrResult" style="height: 100px;width: 100px" class="result"></div> <br /> <br /> <br /> <button type="submit" onclick="generate()" class="btn">Generate</button> Secondly, add this js code in the ** html ** extension file also.

item.title: About Us
item.description: About Us Hello everyone, Welcome to The Coding World Blog (CDW Blog). Coding World Blog is a blog where we will post the articles about the fronted design such as HTML, CSS and JavaScript design. We will also posting some tutorial article about web development, useful tool and etc. In this blog, all the design will be open source and I will sharing the source code directly in the posts.
